participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and hardworking, Emily values her friendships and is focused on her academic goals.
participant_1.background: i do not like chicken. i have blonde hair and blue eyes. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i work at a bar at night to pay for college.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and health-conscious, Jake enjoys staying active and often finds himself in social situations where he loves to share tips about fitness.
participant_2.background: i go to the gym regularly. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. eating is something i do when i'm bored. i have short hair.

content.text: hi how are you today? i just got off work at night.
